title: Serve as Sheriff
beginning: Put 1 Privilege from the bank face up on your discard
end: If you have 5 or fewer schemes in hand, draw 1

title: Privilege
beginning: Take 1 gold
end: Draw 1

title: Declare bankruptcy
beginning: If your deck is empty, take 10 gold
end: Put 1 Privilege from the bank face down on your deck

title: Create a charity
beginning: If you have 5 or less gold, take 10 gold
end: Take 1 Privilege from the bank into your hand

title: Takeover the guilds
beginning: Pay 1 gold for each yellow scheme in play
end: Take the lowest power in play other than this in gold

title: Found a secret order
beginning: Revive your top discard scheme's time
end: Draw as many as the most powerful dungeon scheme has time

title: Purchase shares
beginning: Pay 1 gold for each yellow timeline scheme
end: If the highest rank scheme in play is yellow, take its power in gold

title: Survive your jailer
beginning: Pay 1 gold for each timeline scheme
end: Take the most powerful dungeon scheme's power in gold

title: Impersonate a foreign Countess
beginning: Revive the highest time in the dungeon
end: Draw the highest time in play

title: Promise a title
beginning: If your deck has 5 or more schemes, appoint the top 1 to the court
end: If it has 5 or fewer schemes, draw your entire deck

title: Entrap the Chamberlain
beginning: If your top discard scheme is yellow, take 5 gold
end: If the left timeline scheme is yellow, take its power in gold

title: Bribe the secretary
beginning: Pay 5 gold
end: Draw the total time of all dungeon schemes

title: Revolutionize court fashion
beginning: Revive 1 for each green timeline scheme
end: Draw 1 for each green timeline scheme

title: Advocate reform
beginning: Appoint 1 Privilege from the bank to the court
end: Draw until you have 6 schemes in hand

title: Become the Queen of Thieves
beginning: Revive 1 for each unique dungeon scheme
end: Draw 1 for each unique dungeon scheme

title: Host a wedding
beginning: Pay 1 gold for each scheme in your hand
end: If the left 2 timeline schemes are the same color, take the lower power in gold

title: Vote in the College of Electresses
beginning: Revive 1 for each more powerful scheme in play
end: Draw 1 for each less powerful scheme in play

title: Choose the next Pope
beginning: Pay 30 gold
end: Revive until you have 10 schemes in hand

title: Buccaneer a treasure ship
beginning: If the least powerful scheme in play is red, take its power in gold
end: Otherwise, threaten it

title: Declare martial law
beginning: If the left timeline scheme is green, threaten it
end: Draw its time

title: Lead from the front
beginning: Threaten the least powerful green scheme in play
end: Threaten the least powerful yellow scheme in play

title: Evict the tenants
beginning: If your top discard scheme has 25 or less power, take it in gold
end: If you took gold, appoint it to the court

title: Plunder the treasury
beginning: If the left timeline scheme is yellow, threaten it
end: Threaten the most powerful yellow scheme in play

title: Challenge to a duel
beginning: Threaten the most powerful green scheme in play
end: If it is less powerful, threaten it again

title: Rob the wretched
beginning: Threaten the least powerful green dungeon scheme
end: Threaten the least powerful yellow dungeon scheme

title: Dub a Dame in shining armor
beginning: If your top discard scheme is red, revive 1
end: Otherwise, threaten it

title: Torture the spymaster
beginning: Threaten the most powerful green dungeon scheme
end: Revive as many as it has time

title: Jailbreak
beginning: Threaten the most powerful yellow dungeon scheme
end: If it is less powerful, take its power in gold

title: Storm the dungeon
beginning: If the least powerful dungeon scheme is not red, threaten it
end: If the most powerful dungeon scheme is not red, threaten it

title: Unite the armies
beginning: If every scheme in play is red, draw 1 for each player
end: Otherwise, threaten the most powerful scheme in play that is not red

title: Spread the rebellion
beginning: If your top discard scheme is red, threaten the right timeline scheme
end: Otherwise, threaten the left timeline scheme

title: Steal from the rich and give to the poor
beginning: Take 10 gold for each timeline scheme
end: Pay 1 gold for each lower rank scheme in play

title: Reclaim your rights
beginning: If your top discard scheme is yellow, take its power in gold
end: Otherwise, draw 1 for each timeline scheme of its color

title: Learn ancient alchemy
beginning: Take your top discard scheme's power in gold
end: If it is not yellow, appoint it to the court

title: Steal the diamond
beginning: Take the right timeline scheme's power in gold
end: If there is a red scheme in play, pay 25 gold

title: Mint coins
beginning: Take the left timeline scheme's time in gold
end: If you have the left timeline scheme's power or less gold, take it in gold

title: Embezzle funds
beginning: Take 25 gold for each unique yellow dungeon scheme
end: Take the lowest dungeon power in gold

title: Marry the Duchess
beginning: Pay the left timeline scheme's time in gold
end: Take its power in gold

title: Sell an office
beginning: Take the top scheme in your deck's power in gold
end: Appoint it to the court

title: Smuggle contraband
beginning: If your top discard scheme does not have more power, take it in gold
end: Put your top discard scheme face down on your deck

title: Hold a market fair
beginning: Pay 1 gold for each timeline scheme of the left color
end: Take 25 gold for each timeline scheme of the right color

title: Blackmail her Majesty
beginning: Take the highest dungeon power in gold
end: Taked the highest power in play in gold

title: Enclose peasant land
beginning: Pay 1 gold
end: Draw your entire deck

title: Display piety
beginning: If you have 5 or less schemes in hand, revive 10
end: If your discard is empty, draw 10

title: Defeat the Church
beginning: Revive until your top discard scheme is not red
end: If your top discard scheme is green, draw 10

title: Mask the Crown Princess
beginning: Appoint your top discard scheme to the court until it is green
end: Revive your entire discard

title: Rule alongside your mother
beginning: If your top discard scheme is green, revive 5
end: Draw 5

title: Invest a Bishop
beginning: Revive 1 for each scheme in play with 30 or more power
end: Draw until you have 10 schemes in hand

title: Give fealty
beginning: Pay 10 gold
end: If you have 1 or more gold, draw 10

title: Become a saint
beginning: Pay 25 gold
end: If you have 25 or less gold, draw as many as you have gold

title: Collect debtors
beginning: Pay the total time of all dungeon schemes
end: If the highest dungeon power is 25 or less, draw that many

title: Declare independence
beginning: Take 10 times as much gold as you have
end: Draw 1 for each scheme in your hand
